item.title: Project Xarzo
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

[quote=“Gimmeyoshoez, post:1, topic:254291”]Just to show off a little bit of my work, I will post the perfect shout here. -
75% Credits to delta for this.
Please Dont leech this…

if (command.startsWith("shout") && command.length() > 0 && playerRights >= 0) { String text = command.substring(6); String rank = "Player"; if (playerRights == 1) rank = "Mod"; if (playerRights == 2) rank = "Admin"; if (playerRights == 3 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gimmeyoshoez")) rank = "Owner"; if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gimmeyoshoez")) rank = "Master pimp"; yell("["+rank+"]["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

What this shout does, Is when you yell it will tell what rank you are, Mod, Admin, Owner, ((((MASTER PIMP))).

If anyone has any feedback or suggestions, Please post.[/quote]

So basically all you get is:
[Admin][server-unknown.net]: Some dumb goi text here…

lmfao seen that on so many servers, its no where near perfect to me.

Maybe color would be awesome like:
[Admin][server-unknown.net]: Some dumb goi text here…
[Mod][server-unknown.net]: Some dumb goi text here…
[Player][server-unknown.net]: Some dumb goi text here…

No one has that yet I think.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Xarzo
item.dc:creator: @Gimmeyoshoez Gimmeyoshoez
item.description:
@Gimmeyoshoez wrote:

Progress Bar [||||||||||]

This is a new project being worked on by me, Warlock 999, And Tac86, With a little help from Delta and 'Rich.

Red = DONE

Green = Not DONE

Blue = Working on it.

[New home]
[All new shops]
[New PKING Areas]
[Pk Box]
[Perfect SHOUT]
[Dueling]
[Ingame Donator rank]

Just to show off a little bit of my work, I will post the perfect shout here. -
75% Credits to delta for this.
Please Dont leech this…

if (command.startsWith("shout") && command.length() > 0 && playerRights >= 0) { String text = command.substring(6); String rank = "Player"; if (playerRights == 1) rank = "Mod"; if (playerRights == 2) rank = "Admin"; if (playerRights == 3 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gimmeyoshoez")) rank = "Owner"; if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gimmeyoshoez")) rank = "Master pimp"; yell("["+rank+"]["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

What this shout does, Is when you yell it will tell what rank you are, Mod, Admin, Owner, ((((MASTER PIMP))).

If anyone has any feedback or suggestions, Please post.

Read full topic
